Package com.gmail.mohitsainiknl2.mscalculator.handler.event

Class CalcUtilities

java.lang.Object
com.gmail.mohitsainiknl2.mscalculator.handler.event.CalcUtilities
public class CalcUtilities
extends java.lang.Object
CalcUtilities class help the ActionHandler class to perform the calculation process. this class also take help of the Calculator class to perform the actual calculation in the MSCalculator.

      subText - the text of the subField.
      mainField - the main field of the calculator.
      subField - the sub field of the calculator.

    • calculateResult

      private void calculateResult​(java.lang.String mainNum, java.lang.String prevNum, char operator)
      This calculateResult method help in preparing and calling the Calculator class method to perform calculation.
      Parameters:
      mainNum - number in the mainField.
      prevNum - number of the prev mainField.
      operator - operator for the calculation.

    • calculateResult

      private void calculateResult​(java.lang.String mainNum, java.lang.String prevNum)
      This calculateResult method is a special purpose method, use to perform the calculation. The behavior of the result button is different from the operator button.
      Parameters:
      mainNum - number of the mainField.
      prevNum - number of the prev mainField.

    • convertStringIntoBigNum

      private void convertStringIntoBigNum​(java.lang.String mainNum, java.lang.String prevNum)
      convertStringIntoBigNum method convert the number String into their Big number values.
      Parameters:
      mainNum - number of the mainField.
      prevNum - number of the prev mainField.

    • calculate

      private java.lang.String calculate​(java.lang.String mainNum, java.lang.String prevNum)
      calculate method of this class help to prepare the number to before pushing it to the Calculator class to calculate the result. this method help to differentiate the calculation for integer and decimal.
      Parameters:
      mainNum - this is the number in main-field.
      prevNum - this is the previously typed number.
      Returns:
      result of the calculation in String type.

    • changeIsInteger

      public void changeIsInteger​(java.lang.Boolean value)
      setIsInteger method help to change the big datatype from BigInteger to BigDecimal and from BigDecimal to BigInteger.
      Parameters:
      value - change datatype according to this.
